advancement.petrolsparts.colossal_cogwhe: Power 7 other Cogwheels with a single Colossal Cogwheel

petrolsparts.ponder.coaxial_gear_shaftle: Using Coaxial Cogwheels as shaftless Cogwheels
Coaxial Cogwheels connect similarly to their regular Cogwheel counterparts.
However, they have no Shaft, allowing for configurations that would be impossible with regular Cogwheels.
petrolsparts.ponder.coaxial_gear_through: Use a Coaxial Cogwheel on a Shaft to surround it.
You can also use a Shaft on a Coaxial Cogwheel.
In either case, there must be at least two Shaft blocks.
The Shaft rotates completely independently of the Coaxial Cogwheel.
They can even rotate at different speeds and in different directions.
petrolsparts.ponder.colossal_cogwheel.te: We're going to need more space.
The Colossal Cogwheel can mesh with Large Cogwheels, and will rotate at a third of the speed.
They can also connect to smaller Cogwheels, and will rotate at a sixth of the speed.
They can even connect on the inside, propagating with a factor of three.
petrolsparts.ponder.differential.text_1: Differentials rotate at the average speed of the two input Shafts.
petrolsparts.ponder.differential.text_2: When connected to a small Cog, this is effectively summing the two speeds.
petrolsparts.ponder.differential.text_6: Shafts spinning in the opposite direction are treated like negative numbers.
petrolsparts.ponder.differential.text_10: While connected to two Shafts, the Differential only transfers the stress to the large Cogwheel through one.
petrolsparts.ponder.differential.text_13: If the outer gear is powered, the Differential will break.
Relaying rotational force with Double Cardan Shafts
Using two mechanisms called 'universal joints', Double Cardan Shafts can relay rotatation around a corner.
Use a Wrench to rotate them around the axis you clicked.
petrolsparts.ponder.hydraulic_transmissi: Do you hate the core gameplay mechanic of Create?
The Hydraulic Transmission can make almost any connection.
petrolsparts.ponder.planetary_gearset.he: Out-of-this-world gearing with the Planetary Gearset
petrolsparts.ponder.planetary_gearset.te: Planetary Gearsets connect almost identically to Large Cogwheels (press Q to learn more about these).
However, the Shaft of a Planetary Gearset rotates twice as fast, and in the opposite direction to the teeth.
petrolsparts.tooltip.coaxial_gear.shaft_: Shafts must be at least two blocks in length to go through a Coaxial Cogwheel
